column5: I would check out Salud Clinic.

Your friend probably already knows but they should start by going through Coordinated Entry. OUR Center can help with that. This will get them into a shelter.

https://www.bouldercounty.org/homeless/


I would encourage them to register with Mental Health Partners. They have a lot of resources for people experiencing homelessness and addiction. They can walk into 834 S. Sherman in Longmont to get started. 

Your friend is very lucky to have you!
